reviewText: It a great video and I haves her first one also.  I would recommend both of them  They are short but worth it.

Andrea is a great teacher, being clear in her instructions with beautiful photography making it easy to follow along. Just lacks a little polish. Not a deal breaker, but a little more enthusiasm in the voice would make this perfect. However, it's not a deal breaker and the video is worth having if you want the basics of Portuguese knitting.
This was a gift, my daughter thinks its great. Awesome techniques easy to learn. DVD is well made and instruction is easy to follow along.
